data.name: Slime Islands
data.detailed_description:
Its a puzzle-game where you need to collect different sorts of baby slimes and use them to get through the level. Free up as many slimes u can for more points.

This game features unique puzzle levels with multiple solutions for solving them. Try to come up with a creative idea to solve a level with as many slimes u can.

Use slimes to get through the level. Once collected, u can throw slimes to the place u need them, all slimes have different effects such like spawning explosives to destroy objects or spawning a bigger bouncy slime that launches u higher into the air.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo U7600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 510
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9000
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 510
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
